957.in_progress: <font color='#FF7F00'>Buy 10 Green Imaginite</font> for <font color='#FF7F00'>Commander Beck Strongheart</font> in Avant Gardens.
957.offer: You'll need <font color='#FF7F00'>Green Imaginite</font> for your next mission. Go <font color='#FF7F00'>buy 10</font> from the Gear Vendor.
957.ready_to_complete: Thanks! Here are 250 coins to cover those. You'll need them to <font color='#FF7F00'>play mini-games</font> like Survival.

958.completion_succeed_tip: By collecting all of the Heart Flags on Crux Prime, you've unlocked an extra Life Point!
958.description: Collect 16 Heart Flags on Crux Prime.

960.completion_succeed_tip: By finding the Imagination Brick on Crux Prime, you've unlocked an extra Imagination Point!
960.description: Collect the Imagination Brick on Crux Prime.

961.accept_chat_bubble: Good luck on Crux Prime, mate! And watch out for that Maelstrom!
961.chat_state_1: Hope you got some good gear - you're gonna need it for this one.
961.chat_state_2: Alright, go find them treasure chests!
961.chat_state_3: You braved all that action to find these?
961.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Johnny Thunder in Nimbus Station.
961.in_progress: Find all 8 floating treasure chests on Crux Prime.
961.offer: Been to Crux Prime yet? The Thunder has. Been all over that battlefield. And of course, I hid some chests for you to find!
961.ready_to_complete: You ain't just a treasure hunter, mate - you're a regular treasure hero!

963.accept_chat_bubble: Talk to Honor Accolade. He's got a vendor kiosk by the Sentinel Combat Challenge.
963.chat_state_1: There’s a new vendor in Nexus Tower.
963.chat_state_2: Honor Accolade specializes in special items you may have disposed of.
963.chat_state_3_turnin: Admiral Honor Accolade, at your service!
963.completion_succeed_tip: Check the Sentinel vendor area of Nexus Tower to find Honor Accolade.
963.in_progress: Talk to Honor Accolade in the Sentinel vendor area of Nexus Tower.
963.offer: Have you lost or sold some of your old reward items? Talk to Honor Accolade in the Sentinel vendor area!
963.ready_to_complete: Rewards are to be kept and treasured, not tossed and forgotten! But if you're missing that special something, see what I've got for sale!

964.accept_chat_bubble: Good luck out there, Minifigure. We're counting on you!
964.chat_state_1: Come in Landers, you're breaking up!
964.chat_state_2: Gear up for battle - you'll need it on Crux Prime!
964.chat_state_3_turnin: Spread out! Circle around and keep 'em guessing!
964.completion_succeed_tip: Find the drop-ship door to Crux Prime and travel there, then check in with Sgt. Brannan Landers.
964.in_progress: Go to Crux Prime and check in with Sgt. Brannan Landers.
964.offer: I think you're ready for Crux Prime! Find the drop-ship door just outside the War Room. Fly down and report in with Brannan Landers!
964.ready_to_complete: Welcome to the fight, Minifigure! Hope you're ready to smash some Maelstrom!

965.accept_chat_bubble: Head out towards the planet's edge, then look for the Ruins on the horizon!
965.chat_state_1: First Maelstrom, now Skeletons. What's next?!
965.chat_state_2: Don't even try to fight those Skeletons yet - their bones deflected all of my shots!
965.chat_state_3_turnin: Hmm, Sensei Wu said you might be dressed strangely.
965.completion_succeed_tip: Speak to the mysterious Ninja in the Ruins beyond the Skeletons' canyon on Crux Prime.
965.in_progress: Speak to the mysterious Ninja in the Ruins beyond the Skeletons' canyon on Crux Prime.
965.offer: I got attacked by Skeletons! And then a mysterious Ninja turned into a tornado and saved me! Go find out who that was!
965.ready_to_complete: Are you with the Nexus Force? Then I am glad to see you!

966.accept_chat_bubble: Equip the Spinjitzu weapon I gave you, charge your power and then release a Spinjitzu attack!
966.chat_state_1: These Skeletons are here for an evil purpose - but what is it?
966.chat_state_2: Show me that you can perform a Spinjitzu charge attack!
966.chat_state_3: Haha! You look a little dizzy!
966.completion_succeed_tip: Speak with Neido again on Crux Prime.
966.in_progress: Hold the attack button to charge your new Spinjitzu weapon - then release to unleash Spinjitzu. Show me now!
966.offer: These fiendish Skeletons must be stopped! Only Spinjitzu can defeat them. Show me!
966.ready_to_complete: This is only the first form of Spinjitzu. You can learn the 4 Elemental Forms by traveling to Ninjago!

967.accept_chat_bubble: Use your Spinjitzu to smash 10 of the Skeleton Miners down there!
967.chat_state_1: The Skeletons are very dangerous - but so are Ninjas!
967.chat_state_2: The Skeletons have tried - and failed - to master the Art of Spinjitzu. You must not fail!
967.chat_state_3: How was that for your first spin?
967.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
967.in_progress: Use Spinjitzu to smash 10 Skeleton Miners in the Maelstrom Quarry on Crux Prime.
967.offer: Your training has only begun. And what better way to train than by smashing Skeleton Miners? Smash 10 of them!
967.ready_to_complete: No bones about it, you are on the right path! You learn almost as quickly as I once did! Haha!

968.accept_chat_bubble: Luckily, the Skeletons cannot read our writing. Sometimes I cannot either!
968.chat_state_1: You made it past the Skeletons?
968.chat_state_2: The missing scrolls have taken to the wind! Search everywhere!
968.chat_state_3: Great knowledge is contained within those scrolls!
968.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
968.in_progress: Search Crux Prime until you find all 10 of Neido's scrolls.
968.offer: Sensei Wu sent me here to get help from the Nexus Force! But I lost all of my scrolls! Can you find all 10?
968.ready_to_complete: With this knowledge, you will learn the history of my world! The world of Ninjago!

969.accept_chat_bubble: Interact with the shrine and then page through the scrolls. Read and learn!
969.chat_state_1: You remind me of my fellow Ninjas. This is good.
969.chat_state_2: Study the scrolls and you will learn of our battle against the Skeletons!
969.chat_state_3: Your head is spinning with all this knowledge, is it not?
969.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
969.in_progress: Interact with Neido's shrine to read his scrolls.
969.offer: I sense that you can be trusted with the secrets of Ninjago. Interact with the shrine to learn more of our world.
969.ready_to_complete: Are you ready to learn Spinjitzu? Take this <font color='#FF7F00'>Double-Bladed Dagger of Spinjitzu!</font>

970.accept_chat_bubble: Use your weapons to destroy 10 of those blasting devices - but keep your distance!
970.chat_state_1: Dark energy. What drives the Skeletons to collect it?
970.chat_state_2: If we can smash enough of their destructive devices, perhaps the Skeletons will leave!
970.chat_state_3: KA-BOOM! KA-BOOM! Just like fireworks at the Dragon Festival!
970.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
970.in_progress: Use a ranged weapon to destroy 10 of the Skeletons' Bone Fracture Bombs in the Maelstrom Quarry.
970.offer: The Skeletons are mining that dark energy from the planet's crust! We must stop them by destroying their bombs!
970.ready_to_complete: You put on quite a show! Yet the Skeletons have barely noticed - we must do more!

971.accept_chat_bubble: Rebuild those infernal noisemakers into something more soothing!
971.chat_state_1: How do they listen to that awful noise? They don't even have ears!
971.chat_state_2: If the Skeletons lose their music, perhaps they may lose their will!
971.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
971.in_progress: Smash and then rebuild 3 Skeleton Growlspeakers in the Maelstrom Quarry.
971.offer: The Skeletons keep their pace to strange music. Break their focus by changing the channel on those monstrous devices!

972.accept_chat_bubble: The Skull face might protect a weakness! Then spin to raise the drill and destroy it!
972.chat_state_1: Those spinning contraptions pull the dark energy from the rock!
972.chat_state_2: You cannot attack the machine until you weaken it somehow. There must be a way!
972.chat_state_3: I prefer the ways of peace, but I must say, watching that was quite satisfying!
972.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
972.in_progress: Smash a Skeleton Drilling Rig in the Maelstrom Quarry. Use Spinjitzu to reveal its weakness!
972.offer: Our efforts are not enough. You must find a way to destroy one of their monstrous drilling machines!
972.ready_to_complete: A Ninja must not only strike hard - but strike in the right places! You are as clever as you are brave!

973.accept_chat_bubble: Strike at the Watchtowers' weak spots. Then smash the Watchmen and retrieve those schematic pages!
973.chat_state_1: Those Skeletons keep building demonic contraptions, but how?
973.chat_state_2: Those Watchtowers do not look sturdy - there must be some way of pulling them down!
973.chat_state_3: You certainly know how to put an interesting spin on things!
973.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
973.in_progress: Topple Skeleton Watchtowers, smash the Skeleton Watchmen that fall out, then collect 6 schematic pages.
973.offer: We may learn about Skeleton technology by reading their schematics! Smash the Skeletons in those Watchtowers and find 6 pages!
973.ready_to_complete: These are not Skeleton schematics, they are pieces to a map! But a map to what?

974.accept_chat_bubble: Nuckal is only one of Lord Garmadon's Skeleton Generals - but we must start somewhere!
974.chat_state_1: Now to discover what the Skeletons are really here for!
974.chat_state_2: Nuckal is made of stronger bone than his Skeleton underlings - be wary!
974.chat_state_3: Did you crack that Nuckal? Haha!
974.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
974.in_progress: Find a Maelstrom Crystal by smashing Nuckal, the Skeleton General on Crux Prime.
974.offer: Nuckal oversees the Skeletons' mining efforts. Smash him and retrieve one of the evil Crystals he is searching for!
974.ready_to_complete: So this is what the Skeletons are mining for. Its dark power is most unnerving.

976.accept_chat_bubble: Search the rocks of this world for those bright blue flowers - then give them life!
976.chat_state_1: Even the most determined Ninja needs a treat!
976.chat_state_2: Do you have water? You will need them to nourish the blue flowers first.
976.chat_state_3: I can just imagine the tea we will brew with these!
976.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Neido at the Ninjago Ruins on Crux Prime.
976.in_progress: Water 10 Aura Blossoms on Crux Prime and bring the petals to Neido.
976.offer: I miss the most basic comforts of home. Perhaps if you water those small blossoms and collect their petals, I may brew some tea.
976.ready_to_complete: This tea will help you in dark times. Make more at my kettle whenever you like.

977.accept_chat_bubble: If he's lucky, that pilot might have found higher ground. Search everywhere!
977.chat_state_1: We lost contact with one of our Talons!
977.chat_state_2: The dropship went down to the southeast, but the pilot probably bailed out early!
977.completion_succeed_tip: Find Sherland Powers by Rivendark Canyon on Crux Prime.
977.in_progress: Find Sherland Powers, the Nexus Force Pilot, somewhere on Crux Prime.
977.offer: A Nexus Force dropship flew too close to the Maelstrom and went down! Search for the pilot out on the battlefield!
977.ready_to_complete: Hey! Am I glad to see you! This place is kinda intense!

978.accept_chat_bubble: My head might be rattled from the crash, but I thought I saw a chef out there. And he smelled like BBQ!
978.chat_state_1: Had better days, man. Better days.
978.chat_state_2: I know, where you gonna find BBQ out here, right? But I bet you can!
978.chat_state_3: Oh, I can smell it already. Papa needs some spicy goodness!
978.completion_succeed_tip: Take the BBQ Drumstick back to Sherland Powers on Crux Prime.
978.in_progress: Buy a BBQ Drumstick from the vendor wandering Crux Prime, then take it back to Sherland Powers.
978.offer: I'm not doing so hot, man. Only one thing can heal this hurt - some good ol' BBQ! Can you find some for me?
978.ready_to_complete: Mmm-mmm! You got this from a chef? In a hidden canyon? Sounds like a great place to hide out!

979.accept_chat_bubble: Search the edge of the planet for the ship's computer, rebuild it towards the dropship and then retrieve the data.
979.chat_state_1: If the Tower comes down, we did all this for nothing!
979.chat_state_2: Dropship went down out towards the edge of the planet. Search out that way.
979.chat_state_3: How bad is she? Man, I loved that ship.
979.completion_succeed_tip: You've retrieved the Nexus data from the ship's computer.  Now return to Sherland Powers.
979.in_progress: Find the ship's computer and rebuild it until it's back aboard the dropship. Then recover the data.
979.offer: My ship's computer had secret data about the Imagination Nexus. You need to find the computer, rebuild it onto the ship and then get that data!
979.ready_to_complete: You did it! Exeter would've had me flying hot air balloons if this had fallen into the wrong hands!

980.accept_chat_bubble: There should still be plenty of those Admirals wandering around. Teach 'em a lesson!
980.chat_state_1: I can't concentrate on this data with those things still out there!
980.chat_state_2: Whole mess of 'em just swarmed me, soon as I hit the ground!
980.chat_state_3: Am I glad to see you again!
980.completion_succeed_tip: The Stromling Admirals have had enough. Return to Sherland Powers on Crux Prime.
980.in_progress: Smash 15 Stromling Admirals on Crux Prime.
980.offer: Since you're armed and all, how 'bout a favor? I got attacked by some Stromling Admirals and I'd like a little payback!
980.ready_to_complete: Wham! Pow! Blammo! Good thing those monsters didn't get a taste of my right hook!

987.accept_chat_bubble: You'll have to work together to complete a build that big!
987.chat_state_2: You might want to team up with some other Minifigures to build those Shield Zones.
987.chat_state_3: Fight the Maelstrom with Imagination. That's what it all boils down to.
987.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Brannan Landers at Sentinel Point Zeta on Crux Prime.
987.in_progress: Quick Build 1 Shield Generator on Crux Prime. Work with other minifigures to complete the build.
987.offer: We've deployed Shield Generators on the battlefield. They take a lot of Imagination, so work with <font color='#FF7F00'>friends.</font> Build one!
987.ready_to_complete: Long as we keep those shields up, all of the Nexus troops coming through here can keep fighting!

989.accept_chat_bubble: Head back to Nexus Tower, then to Nimbus Station for the launcher to Avant Gardens!
989.chat_state_1: Come and get some, you purple freakshows!
989.chat_state_2: Anything that halts their advance is worth a try! These things just keep coming!
989.chat_state_3_turnin: Whoa, someone around here smells like Maelstrom!
989.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Sky Lane at the launch area in Avant Gardens.
989.in_progress: Talk to Sky Lane at the launch area in Avant Gardens.
989.offer: Want some new toys to play with? I hear Venture's developed some new tech that'll stun these monsters! Check with Sky Lane to get the goods!
989.ready_to_complete: You came all the way from Crux Prime? Wow, you've seen a lot of action!

990.accept_chat_bubble: Head to Forbidden Valley and look for Echs Ray at the Refinery.
990.chat_state_1: I kind of like these Mermaid songs, you know? Nice and soothing.
990.chat_state_2: Echs Ray is the scientist at the Refinery, just north of Brick Fury's firing zone.
990.chat_state_3_turnin: Sky Lane sent you? Oh, I like her. She's, um, brave.
990.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Echs Ray at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.
990.in_progress: Talk to Echs Ray at the Paradox Refinery in Forbidden Valley.
990.offer: These Mermaids will work on the Pirates, but you'll need something to keep those Ronin at bay! Check with Echs Rays in Forbidden Valley.
990.ready_to_complete: You've been to Crux Prime? I'd love to study the Maelstrom there, but this place is scary enough!

991.accept_chat_bubble: Some of that Imagination Tea will probably work wonders for me!
991.chat_state_1: Don't tell anyone, but I'm ready for a vacation.
991.chat_state_2: Go visit that Ninja and get some more that tea for me, okay?
991.chat_state_3: Just in time, only thing keeping me awake are the explosions!
991.completion_succeed_tip: Return to Brannan Landers at Sentinel Point Zeta on Crux Prime.
991.in_progress: Take some of Neido's Imagination Tea to Brannan Landers on Crux Prime.
991.offer: I've been stationed here for hours. I hear that mysterious Ninja makes a mean Imagination Tea. That might pep me up!
991.ready_to_complete: Whoa, that is powerful stuff! Now I feel like I could take on the whole Maelstrom myself!

993.accept_chat_bubble: Search Crux Prime for Bone Digs, then use your Skeleton Pet to dig them up!
993.chat_state_1: Skeletons mining for Maelstrom you say? That does sound ominous.
993.chat_state_2: Search Crux Prime for a bone poking up from the dirt, then call out your little Skeleton Dragon pet!
993.chat_state_3: Skeletons! Burying bones! How perfectly obvious!
993.completion_succeed_tip: You've found enough bones. Now return to Mardolf the Orange in Nimbus Station.
993.in_progress: Use the Skeleton Dragon Pet to dig up 10 Bone Digs on Crux Prime, then take the bones back to Mardolf.
993.offer: I hear there are strange bones buried on Crux Prime. Use your new Skeleton Dragon pet to dig them up. Then bring them back to me!
993.ready_to_complete: These aren't just bones you've found! We can use them to build something strange and ingenious!

994.accept_chat_bubble: I'm sure Mardolf will be keenly interested in that Skeleton Pet of yours!
994.chat_state_1: All Pets just need a little love, even the dreadful ones!
994.chat_state_2: Mardolf knows a great many things - about bricks, bones and more!
994.chat_state_3_turnin: What have you brought me, builder? A bony Pet, you say?
994.completion_succeed_tip: Talk to Mardolf the Orange in Nimbus Station.
994.in_progress: Talk to Mardolf the Orange in Nimbus Station.
994.offer: Your new Dragon friend wants to dig, but dig what? Perhaps Mardolf can help. Go and see him!
994.ready_to_complete: What a clever little beast you've found! And it likes to dig you say? I know just the thing!

996.accept_chat_bubble: Talli Reeko is out there somewhere!
996.chat_state_1: Who wants a piece of one mean Stromling?
996.chat_state_2: Search the battlefield until you find Talli Reeko!
996.description: Smash Talli Reeko on Crux Prime!
996.in_progress: Smash the Stromling named Talli Reeko on Crux Prime.
996.offer: Stromlings all smell bad, but Talli Reeko is the worst! Go get rid of it!
996.ready_to_complete: Did you get it? More importantly, did you get any on you?

999.accept_chat_bubble: I suggest that you check in with your Faction Leader first.
999.chat_state_1: I can tell by your gear and adventurous spirit that you are a member of the Venture League.
999.chat_state_2: Follow the Venture League logos to find Hael Storm's Observatory.
999.chat_state_3_turnin: Hael Storm, in the flesh! Course they're real dreads!
999.completion_succeed_tip: Follow the Venture League logos to find Hael Storm in his Observatory.
999.in_progress: Follow the Venture League logos to find Hael Storm in his Observatory.
999.offer: Venture League members should have no problem navigating Nexus Tower. You will find your leader, Hael Storm, in his Observatory.
999.ready_to_complete: If you found yer way up here, you've got some Venture in you, alright!
